LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_ErrorLoadingPreset: An error occurred while loading the preset.
LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_ErrorLoadingPresetInfo: An error occurred while loading the preset information.
LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_NoOverwritePresetTemplate: It is not allowed to overwrite a template preset.
LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_ErrorSavingPreset: An error occurred while saving the preset.
LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_NoDeletePresetTemplate: It is not allowed to delete a template preset.
LanguageData.PLPRESTMAN_ErrorDeletingPreset: An error occurred while deleting the preset.
